organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Dr. Mary Chinery-Hesse, a retired International Civil Servant worked at the United Nations as Resident Coordinator and UNDP Resident Representative
She was then appointed as the first woman Deputy Director-General of the International Labour Organization, with the rank of Under Secretary-General of the United Nations.

quotes: She currently serves on the Five-Member African Union Panel Of The Wise.
